_description: Gospel for Friday following the 2nd Sunday after the Octave of Epiphany in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Descendand ihesu forto cumTo a cete þat hight capharnaum…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And for þat he slike wonders wroughtfful mekill folk vnto him soght
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Descendit ihesu crist in capharnaum.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia sexta proxima euangelium Secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 35ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.289-291.
